column5: 14 times, never done before by any country.
CONGRATULATIONS....can't say we didn't make Canada work for it.....and a NICE CEREMONY after the game....  Bob
Yeah! It sure wasn't Miller time tonite!
Despite what some of us might believe, none of us had anything to do with it. But it sure does feel good.

It was a great game.   The states were amazing.   They could have won gold this year never mind 4 years from now.   USA hockey looks fantastic.  That being said.   PHEW!!!!!!   Gold baby.   I am loving being a Canadian right now.   Best feeling ever
i shop at Rona and have an RBC account
